about.title: About me
about.p1: Fullstack developer based in Montpellier, I design and improve features to be reliable and user-friendly, on both front-end and back-end. I aim to balance **design**, **usability**, and **architecture** to create smooth experiences across web and mobile. I pay particular attention to coherence, structure, and overall product quality.
about.p2: Through various projects, I have built complete tools integrating **APIs**, data management, and **polished, responsive interfaces**, which strengthened my technical decision-making and teamwork skills. I also participated in a **prize-winning hackathon** and contributed to the **redesign of a website** for an association encouraging women to pursue careers in tech.
about.p3: Today, I continue expanding my skills with **modern frameworks** and am eager to contribute to a dynamic team and concrete projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This page explains in detail how your personal information is collected, used, and protected when you use the contact form on this site. The collection aims to respond to your inquiries while ensuring the security and confidentiality of your data.
privacy.dataCollectionText: When you fill out the contact form, certain personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, the subject of your message, and the message content is collected. This information is used to understand your request and respond accurately. No other data is collected without your explicit consent.
privacy.useOfDataText: The information you provide is used solely to process and respond to your inquiry. It is never shared with third parties and is not used for any commercial purposes. Access to these data is strictly limited and your information remains confidential.
privacy.dataRetentionText: Your information is transmitted directly to my email for the purpose of responding to your message. It is retained only until your inquiry has been addressed. No additional storage or processing is performed, and your data remains securely in my mailbox.
privacy.contactTextStart: If you have any questions, concerns, or need clarification regarding any aspect of this privacy policy, you can reach me directly by e-mail at
privacy.contactTextEnd: for any further clarification or request.
